name: Seal World
description:
Seal Discord

You have become a seal! Welcome to Seal World! Get a nice and relaxing break!





Explore a wholesome, happy and relaxing world!



Talk to other friendly seals! Make simple choices!



Collect lots of FIBSH!! As much as possible!!



Swim! Inspect interesting objects, and relax in peaceful spots!

Become part of this silly world full of seals!

Features:
  • Exploration
  • Dialogue
  • Collect Fibsh
  • Unlock Hats
  • Simple Decisions
  • Simple Platforming
  • Relax!


    Support The Game!
